snippet: A special reprint of the Inverted Jenny — with an upright surprise hidden among the sheets — is being reissued to rekindle interest in stamp collecting and draw a new generation to the hobby.
abstract: United States Postal Service has issued a special reprint of the Inverted Jenny, classic 95-year-old stamp error known to collectors, as part of an effort to rekindle the public's excitement over stamp collecting and draw a new generation to the hobby.
lead_paragraph: A special reprint of the Inverted Jenny — with an upright surprise hidden among the sheets — is being reissued to rekindle interest in stamp collecting and draw a new generation to the hobby.

headline.main: To Delight Stamp Collectors, Postal Service Turns a Famous Mistake Upside Down
headline.print_headline: To Delight Stamp Collectors, Postal Service Turns a Famous Mistake Upside Down
